english.segment1: Walking down the road called life. Thinking how my world has changed. Since i met the saving grace. of the man they called Jesus Christ
english.segment2: * He's not just an ordinary guy. He is supernatural in all ways. He's not just in my imagination. He is real in everyway
english.segment4: Worship the King of Glory. Open up the doors, lift up the gates. The King of Glory, may He enter in. May His power fall, may His glory fill. All the earth
english.segment5: People come and people go, Something's in and then it's out. One thing that remains the same. Is the Love I've found Jesus Christ
